other_tests.findings: Sinus rhythm at a rate of 96 beats per minute, with nonspecific ST-segment and T-wave changes.
Enlarged thyroid with diffusely increased uptake of the pertechnetate, features consistent with Graves' disease.
Free T4 level of 1.1 ng per deciliter, indicating a decrease in thyroid hormone levels.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Two months later, free T4 level was low and thyrotropin level was elevated.
